attributes.action: designate a new public holiday in June celebrating the contributions of veterans living in our communities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plans for a Veterans Day were announced in February 2006 by the then Chancellor of the Exchequer, Gordon Brown, who said the aim was to ensure that the contribution of veterans was never forgotten. Every year since then, June has provided a focus for the nation to recognise the part played by veterans of all ages in conflicts both past and present. The addition of a public holiday would allow all members of the public to celebrate the contibutions of all of of our armed forces. To quote a great leader 'Never was so much owed by so many to so few'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
